title: KOREA EUNDAN MEGADOSE B -850mg x 64Pcs 1 box
text:
-Megadose B >> Premium grade B vitamins from Korea, containing 8 types of B vitamins
B vitamins or vitamin B complex that we know is often familiar in the form of dietary supplements. But did you know that there are many types of B vitamins? And they all have different benefits and side effects. Each B vitamin works to complement each other. They must be taken together to be more effective than taken separately. The different types of vitamin B complex are vitamin B1, vitamin B2, vitamin B3, vitamin B5, vitamin B6, vitamin B7, vitamin B9, vitamin B12
Details
B1- Helps nourish nerves, muscles and heart, reduce beriberi. It helps to digest carbohydrates well.
B2- helps in the growth process and reproductive system
B3-lowers cholesterol and triglycerides and help burn fat
B5-Helps in the cellular processes of body growth.
B6- produces hemoglobin in red blood cells regulate hormone balance Reduce cramps
B7- Nourish hair and nails
B9-Strengthening the brain Help drive fat out of the liver.
B12-Helps the nervous system, nourishes the brain
Megadose B, full of important B vitamins, helps to energize the daily life of all ages.
Suitable for students, working people, health lovers and the elderly
-1 box contains 64 Pcs
Guaranteed authentic from Korea 100%
